refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the name of the cell to which a machine belongs

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The fs wscell command returns the name of the local machine's home cell.

listitem.para: Prints the online help for this command. All other valid options are ignored.

refsect1.title: Output
refsect1.para: The output displays the contents of the local /usr/vice/etc/ThisCell file, in the format

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: The following example results when the fs wscell is issued on a machine in the State University cell:
refsect1.programlisting: % fs wscell This workstation belongs to cell 'stateu.edu'
